# StringUtility.Compress method

Compresses a string.

```csharp
public static byte[] Compress(string text)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| text | The text. |

## Return Value

null if text is null, empty byte[] if text is empty, otherwise the compressed byte array.
